name: Dupray Industries
overview:
DuprayÂ® is North America’s leading supplier of the most technologically advanced vapor steam cleaners. Year after year, Dupray surpass customers expectations by providing customers with only high-end, super powerful steam cleaners and steam machines. Dupray’s line of TecnovapÂ® enhanced vapor steam cleaners is currently by far the industry’s best in the category and includes commercial steam cleaners, industrial steam cleaners and residential steam cleaners.

Among these amazing steamers fall the complete line of Tecnovap’s commercial and industrial steam cleaner, with cleaning applications in virtually any industry.

The strong antibacterial properties of superheated steam, generated by Dupray’s most advanced steam machines, is the main reason behind the company rapid expansion. Hospitals, home owners and property managers are eliminating over 99.5% of allergens, pathogens, mold spores, bacterias and virus within seconds of supersteam exposition at up to 386Â°F. Dupray’s steam cleaners also come packed with numerous heavy-duty accessories and tools to accomplish a wide range of cleaning applications such as grout cleaning, tile cleaning, floor sanitation, gum removal, bed bug extermination and more! Some of Dupray’s steam cleaners even integrate a special detergent tank and a powerful vacuum to extract while steam cleaning. Steam is definitely the most environmentally friendly way to clean and sanitize any surface.

Dupray’s remarkable line of top quality cleaning equipment also includes steam pressure washers, Multiplo floor scrubbers, steam grout cleaners and carpet cleaners.
